article.article: Huawei Mate X – the Chinese telecommunications giant's first foldable smartphone – is all set to arrive in India later this year. The Indian division of Huawei Consumer Business Group has confirmed that the Mate X will be launched in India later this year, but the company has not specified a concrete launch timeline regarding the Mate X's debut in the country. Aside from confirming the impending launch, no additional information has been revealed so far regarding the market availability or estimated pricing of the 5G-ready foldable smartphone that is brimming with flagship hardware and innovative design.
article.title: Huawei Mate X 5G Foldable Smartphone Confirmed to Launch in India Later This Year
